title: New Astigmatic Font Collection on Sale Now!
content:
The Astigmatic One Eye Typographic Institute has just released its Specimen Collection Vol. I. From inspirations both retro and today, Volume I captures an eclectic array of offbeat and playful typographic specimens, from the bold to the lightweights and everything in-between, 14 fonts in all. This set is alive with playful pizzazz!   
   
Check it out at [http://www.astigmatic.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192513/http:/www.astigmatic.com/)   
   
Purchase this set and you get access to the super-cool bonus font archives with over 20 great fonts.
author: Diner
